Please check any stats or information if you are unsure how accurate they are. No guarantees are made wit regards to results or financial gain. All forms of betting carry financial risk and it is down to the individual to make bets with or without the assistance of information provided on this site.

Casino and Slot uses USD as default currency. If your account currency is not USD, then it will be converted in to USD value as per latest exchange rates. When you play the games, your winning and stake is converted back to your default local currency.

Yes, I agree to privacy policy

20-30% commission earnings on your referred affiliates revenue
Easy, quick and simple to join. No extra documentation required.
Easy payout. You can transfer earnings to betting account for placing bet without restrictions
Earnings on almost all products including exchange, sportsbook, casino, games etc.

After joining, you must have referred at least 5 users under your affiliate account in next 30 days (just at the begning). Failing to do so may results in deactivation of affiliate account. You may refer to other terms and conditions from the bottom of page.
You must provide one verifiable social media/website link to get started.Incorrect or misleading link may lead to deactivation of your affiliate account

DO NOT close this tab/page when you are sending money to the address or scanning code. You can open in new tab and send money. Once you have sent money to the given address, come back here and wait until transaction is complete. You should wait until "Payment Complete" message is displayed on the screen. Your account will not be credited if you close tab before "payment complete" message is displayed..
in order to deposit funds with local payments / cash you should contact your direct agent, official gambabet agents can recive payment and credit your account balance.

Promo betting balance is available for use after exhaustion of actual balance
Your promo balance is available for betting only after your actual deposit balance becomes zero.

If you want to forego your bet credit and starts betting with actual balance, you can clear the promo balance to 0 from below or just deposit more balance. Recovery and withdrawal(if t and c already fulfilled) is not possible once you take this option.

Note* : Tickets are assaigned according to the receipt time of messages and is queued for response accordingly. Response may take anything between 1 hour to 72 hours... All messaging records older than 3 months will be deleted without intimation.

You may use this platform as standard emails communication NOT as a chatting platform. Unnecessary messages may not get response from our staff. Always send message with clear writing in details at one go. This way you will get your problems resolved way faster. Should you have any problem, let us know.
Note* : Once deactiavted, you will not be able to reactiavte yourself. In that case, you will have to contact our support person to reactivate again.
